arts.ttl: Ipswich vs Watford predictions: Hornets to struggle on their travels
arts.sum: Watford have yet to win away from home this season and Tom Hill expects the Hornets to struggle when they visit Portman Road to take on Ipswich on Tuesday night.

arts.ttl: Ipswich vs Watford - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's Championship clash between Ipswich Town and Watford, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: “Has to be a worry”: Ipswich Town vs Watford predictions
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Ipswich Town vs Watford predictions ahead of the Championship clash on Tuesday. The post “Has to be a worry”: Ipswich Town vs Watford predictions appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
